Body:
ns = 50
nt = 60
Xs, ys = ot.datasets.make_data_classif('3gauss', ns, random_state=42)
Xt, yt = ot.datasets.make_data_classif('3gauss2', nt, random_state=42)
C1 = ot.dist(Xs)
C2 = ot.dist(Xt)
n_samples = 3
Cb = ot.gromov.gromov_barycenters(n_samples, [C1, C2], [ot.unif(ns), ot.
    unif(nt)], ot.unif(n_samples), [0.5, 0.5], 'square_loss', max_iter=100,
    tol=0.001, verbose=True)
np.testing.assert_allclose(Cb.shape, (n_samples, n_samples))
Cb2 = ot.gromov.gromov_barycenters(n_samples, [C1, C2], [ot.unif(ns), ot.
    unif(nt)], ot.unif(n_samples), [0.5, 0.5], 'kl_loss', max_iter=100, tol
    =0.001)
np.testing.assert_allclose(Cb2.shape, (n_samples, n_samples))
